Name: Possession of Site
Tag 1: Possession of Site

Name: Dial Before You Dig (DBYD) & Permit to Excavate
Tag 1: Dial Before You Dig (DBYD) and Permit to Excavate completed and signed onto by personnel

Name: Confirmation of Scope & Extent of Works
Tag 1: Confirmation of Scope and Extent of Works with Project Team, including RCC and TSC

Name: Testing required for scope
Tag 1: Testing required for the scope:

Name: Concrete testing Density Testing
Tag 1: Concrete testing Density Testing

Name: Traffic Control – TGS approved
Tag 1: Traffic Control – TGS approved and appropriately selected for the works

Name: Erosion & Sediment Control
Tag 1: Erosion and Sediment Control:

Name: Silt Boom Earth Bund/Sediment Fence
Tag 1: Silt Boom Earth Bund /Sediment Fence

Name: Minor clearing of vegetation undertaken
Tag 1: Minor clearing of vegetation undertaken – where applicable.

Name: Demolition works/Spoil Removal undertaken
Tag 1: Demolition works / Spoil Removal undertaken and spoil removed from site to Quirks Quarry.

Name: Table drains shaped to allow water to flow freely
Tag 1: Table drains shaped to allow water to flow freely and best marry into existing surfaces.

Name: Proof roll subgrade
Tag 1: Proof roll subgrade: If foundation fails TSC to be notified and to provided direction

Name: Road base Material
Tag 1: Road base Material: Material source along with conforming material NATA test certificates have been submitted and approved by the Principal (Material Stockpile Lot)

Name: Layers compacted to 100% Standard compaction
Tag 1: If testing required - Layers compacted to 100% Standard compaction for full formation width. Compaction testing to be done 1 test per 500m2, minimum of 3 test taken at a time (per lot) or as directed otherwise.

Name: Levels of gravel marry into existing
Tag 1: Levels of gravel marry into existing and deviation does not exceed 12mm over the length of a 3m straight edge.

Name: Geotextile
Tag 1: Geotextile – A34 Geotextile separator placed prior to rock placement IF DIRECTED or WITHIN SCOPE

Name: Rock Placement
Tag 1: Rock Placement - Rock to be placed in completed drain profile as per agreed scope. Correct Rock Size Placed:

Name: Existing rock to be grouted as per agreed scope
Tag 1: Existing rock to be grouted as per agreed scope.

Name: Rocks cleaned down at end of grouting
Tag 1: Rocks to be cleaned down at end of grouting for neat finish

Name: Suitable subgrade material
Tag 1: Suitable subgrade material and prepared to suitable surface

Name: Dimensions & positions of forms checked
Tag 1: Dimensions and positions of forms shall be carefully checked after the forms are erected. Forms shall be aligned accurately and the location of all fittings, hold formers etc. checked prior to placing of concrete.

Name: Placing of reinforcement as per agreed scope
Tag 1: Placing of reinforcement as per agreed scope, with reference to Typical Construction Details. Reinforcement to maintain a 50mm vertical and horizontal cover unless directed otherwise.

Name: Concrete mixed & delivered with reqs. of AS 1379
Tag 1: The concrete shall be mixed and delivered in accordance with the requirements of AS 1379 relating to: -

Name: Freshly placed concrete compacted
Tag 1: The freshly placed concrete compacted by continuous spading, slicing or by vibrator units. Exposed surfaces of the concrete shall be struck off and finished with a wooden float. Corners and edges should be as per the drawings.

Name: Surfaces floated, finished & cured as required
Tag 1: Surfaces are floated, finished and cured as required to a quality finish. Broom finish as required.

Name: Two pairs of test specimens moulded
Tag 1: Two pairs of test specimens shall be moulded for each 15 cubic metres of concrete, or part thereof, one pair being intended for the 7-day test if required and the other pair for a 28-day test.

Name: Stormwater components installed as per scope
Tag 1: Stormwater components installed as per scope of works

Name: Density testing of pipeline if within roadway
Tag 1: Density testing of pipeline required if within roadway:- 100% compaction to be achieved

Name: Site Handover
Tag 1: Site Handover: All works complete, demobilised and site handed back to TSC

Name: Verify conformance including close out of NCR’s
Tag 1: Verify conformance including close out of NCR’s

Name: Damage No. (DM) signed off & closed by PM/rep.
Tag 1: Damage No. (DM) signed off and closed by PM or representative
